mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.SUPPLIERNAMEID, b.COMPANY, c.PROJECT_NAME, c.MANAGERID, d.OPERATIONFORM, d.JOBCLASSIFICATION, d.ALLTECHNOLOGY, d.SITEVALUATION, d.EXITREASON, d.BUSINESSIMPACT, d.COUNTERMEASURE FROM delegainformation a INNER JOIN projectsystem b ON a.PROJECTSYSTEM_ID = b.PROJECTSYSTEM_ID INNER JOIN companyprojects c ON a.COMPANYPROJECTS_ID = c.COMPANYPROJECTS_ID INNER JOIN expatriatesinfor d ON b.SUPPLIERNAMEID = d.SUPPLIERNAMEID
